subject: Why be an average guy any longer
body:
Hi





We were. Laird Maitland rules 
Ramsey concurred. I also count
Otis smiled. Brodick rules wit

And what would they have done?
Replace the commanders with me
We are loyal to our laird, Gid
Nay, Brisbane countered. Im me
Ramsey didnt agree or disagree
We cant wait any longer, Laird
Would your soldiers willingly 
Aye, they would, Otis insisted
